name: Penguin Game (TJ Lagasse)
description:
This project was made by Harleigh Bass and TJ Lagasse for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam. We missed the deadline though, woops! 

Software used: 

  • Unity
  • Maya
  • Blender
  • GIMP
  • sfxr (https://www.drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html)

Music used: Blippy Trance by Kevin MacLeod 

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/5759-blippy-trance
